ygData.subject: Re: Some Questions
ygData.msgSnippet: Raising your skill is really simple.  All you need to do keep doing the cheapest thing until it s trivial.  Then, find the next cheapest thing, and do that
ygData.messageBody:
Raising your skill is really simple. All you need to do keep doing the cheapest thing until it's trivial. Then, find the next cheapest thing, and do that until it's trivial. Repeat until your fingers bleed. Keep in mind, though, difficulty is only based on the most expensive part, NOT the sum of the parts, so always use 3 6cp pieces, and 1 other piece.

Slig of Povar

>>> <buffsealy@...> 07/19 10:11 PM >>>
From: buffsealy@...

I'm Lubin, A lvl 19 Half Elf Druid with a skill of 53

I was wondering what I should do to best raise my skill at this point, please tell me what to make and how to make it, any help will be appreciated.
